data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 847, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Torba, Vanuatu
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Torba, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Torba, Vanuatu.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Torba with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Torba, Vanuatu.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Torba, Vanuatu from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.section_summary:
the state of Torba, Vanuatu has a population of 9,500.

We estimate Torba has 3,927 people who might know Jesus, 4,726 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 847 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 2 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Torba, Vanuatu to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.

location.name: Torba
